headline: Wedbush Maintains Outperform Rating on Palo Alto Networks (PANW) After Q3 Report
summary: On May 21, Wedbush analyst Daniel Ives reaffirmed his positive stance on Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW), maintaining an Outperform rating and a $225 price target. The rating came after the company posted impressive Q3 2025 results, in which it beat expectations across key metrics. Palo Alto Networks’ (NASDAQ:PANW) Q3 revenue hit the high end […]

headline: Should Investors Buy, Sell or Hold PANW Stock Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: Despite Q3 earnings beat, Palo Alto Networks stock dips on margin pressure and contract shifts. However, promising long-term prospects make the stock worth holding.

headline: Is Palo Alto Networks Stock a Buy Now?
summary: Shares of Palo Alto Networks dipped after investors showed dismay over its latest guidance.  The stock trades at an expensive valuation, and investors probably expected a stronger outlook.  Palo Alto Networks (NASDAQ: PANW) has experienced a topsy-turvy ride on the stock market so far this year, rising impressively in the first couple of months, then taking a steep tumble as tariff-fueled turmoil dented investors' confidence in technology stocks.
